hero.title: The Graph Docs
hero.description: Kick start your web3 project with the tools to extract, transform, and load blockchain data.

products.title: The Graph’s Products
products.description: Choose a solution that fits your needs–interact with blockchain data your way.

subgraphs.title: Subgraphs
subgraphs.description: Extract, process, and query blockchain data with open APIs.

substreams.title: Substreams
substreams.description: Fetch and consume blockchain data with parallel execution.

firehose.title: Firehose
firehose.description: Extract blockchain data into flat files for faster sync times and streaming capacities.

graphNode.title: Graph Node
graphNode.description: Index blockchain data and serve it via GraphQL queries.
graphNode.cta: Set up a local Graph Node

graphCli.title: Graph CLI
graphCli.description: Create and manage your subgraphs from your command line.

guides.title: Guides & Cookbooks
guides.description: This guide will quickly take you through how to initialize, create, and deploy your subgraph to Subgraph Studio.

findData.title: Find Data in Graph Explorer
findData.description: Leverage hundreds of public subgraphs for existing blockchain data.

becomeAnIndexer.title: Become an Indexer
becomeAnIndexer.description: Run an indexing node to serve data on The Graph.

theGraphExplained.title: The Graph Explained In 1 Minute
theGraphExplained.description: What is The Graph? How does it work? Why does it matter so much to web3 developers? Learn how and why The Graph is the backbone of web3 in this short, non-technical video.

howToIndexSolana.title: How to Index Solana with a Substreams-powered Subgraph
